{{cpp/chrono/month_day_last/title|month}}
{{cpp/chrono/month_day_last/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
constexpr std::chrono::month month() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Retrieves a copy of the {{lc|std::chrono::month}} object stored in {{c|*this}}.

===Return value===
A copy of the {{lc|std::chrono::month}} object stored in {{c|*this}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

using namespace std::chrono;

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha;

    auto mdl{February/last}; // Last day of a February
    auto ymdl{year(2020) / mdl};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (year_month_day{ymdl} == year_month_day{February/29/2020}) &lt;&lt; ' ';

    mdl = (mdl.month() + months(1)) / last; // Last day of the next month, in 2020
    ymdl = year(2020) / mdl;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (year_month_day{ymdl} == year_month_day{March/31/2020}) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
true true
}}
